eu.shooktea.vmsm.module.mysql

Class MySQL

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.shooktea.vmsm.module.VMModule
      • eu.shooktea.vmsm.module.mysql.MySQL

  • public class MySQL
extends VMModule
    Module representing MySQL connection.

    MySQL module can be configured by host address, port, username, password and name of database. Port by default is 3306 and host address is 127.0.0.1, as most probably connection will be established via SSH tunnelling. If no tunnelling is used, host address should be a proper address to VM's database.

    SSH tunnelling can be also specified. If SSH module is on and configured, then configuration of tunnelling is taken automatically from there, otherwise it need to be filled in manually.

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.Runnable> openConfigWindow()
